During the three months ended June 30, 2022, we recognized a loss of $ 127.2 million associated with the sale, comprised of the difference between the consideration received and the net carrying amount of the business and the reclassification of $ 63 million of associated accumulated foreign currency translation losses from the separate component of equity.

forward_snippets: We expect that a portion of the goodwill from this acquisition will be deductible for income tax purposes.
